system.description:
Your poisons—those emitted by you, crafted by you, or caused by spell effects you control—pierce through enemy defenses. You treat creatures with immunity to poison damage as only having resistance, and you treat creatures with resistance to poison damage as though they did not have it. You treat creatures who are neither immune nor resistant to poison damage as vulnerable to your poison damage, and they have disadvantage on saving throws made to resist your poisons.

Creatures with immunity to the poisoned condition are still subject to yours, but they have advantage on their saving throw. Other creatures have disadvantage on such saving throws.
